onboarding.step1.title: Haɗu da Kwararru
onboarding.step1.text: Haɗu da ƙwararrun mutane masu amfani da AI don samun jagora kan sana'a, lafiya, da rayuwa.
onboarding.step2.title: Koyi & Ci Gaba
onboarding.step2.text: Binciko darussa daga matakin firamare zuwa jami'a tare da malamai na AI a Makaranta, makarantar mu ta intanet.
onboarding.step3.title: Ƙirƙiri & Cimma Nasara
onboarding.step3.text: Yi amfani da kayan aikin AI masu ƙarfi don rubuta takardu, samar da dabaru, da cimma burikanka da sauri.
home.title: Kwararru
home.search.placeholder: Bincika da suna, jiha, ko ma'aikata...

profile.title: Bayanin Hali
chat.info.creatorDisclaimer: Bello Abubakar Atiku ne ya kirkiri Kwararru. Da fatan za a tuna cewa wannan tattaunawar don dalilai ne na bayanai kawai.
chat.info.startConversationError: Yi haƙuri, ban iya fara tattaunawar ba. Da fatan za a koma ku sake gwadawa.
chat.info.sendMessageError: Yi haƙuri, na gamu da kuskure. Da fatan za a sake gwadawa.

chat.voice.label: Zaɓi murya

settings.premium.title: Kai na Musamman ne!
settings.premium.description: Kuna da damar yin amfani da duk abubuwan musamman.
settings.upgrade.title: Haɓaka zuwa na Musamman
settings.upgrade.description: Buɗe duk kayan aikin jagoranci da fasalulluka na musamman.

myProfile.error.uploadFailed: An kasa sanya hoto. Da fatan za a sake gwadawa.
completeProfile.title: Cika Bayananka
completeProfile.description: Kadan daga cikin bayanai don farawa.
admin.personas.title: Sarrafa Hali
admin.personas.deleteConfirm: Ka tabbata kana son share wannan halin? Ba za a iya mayar da wannan aikin ba.
admin.personas.none: Ba a sami hali a cikin ma'ajin bayanai ba. Aikace-aikacen yana amfani da halayen da aka adana a ciki.
personaEditor.error.id: Ana buƙatar ID kuma ba za a iya samun sarari ba.
emptyState.message.adjustFilters: Gwada daidaita bincikenka ko matatunka don nemo abin da kake nema.
emptyState.message.checkLater: Babu abun ciki da za a nuna a yanzu. Da fatan za a sake dubawa anjima.
chatHistory.title: Tarihin Tattaunawa
chatHistory.empty.title: Babu Tattaunawa Tukuna
chatHistory.empty.message: Fara tattaunawa da wani hali kuma tattaunawarka za ta bayyana a nan.
chatHistory.deleteConfirm: Ka tabbata kana son share wannan tattaunawar gaba daya? Ba za a iya mayar da wannan aikin ba.
